tasks.label: Criar nova feature
tasks.command: echo '[30m📚 Criando nova feature...' && mkdir -p lib/app/features/feature_name/data/models lib/app/features/feature_name/data/repositories lib/app/features/feature_name/ui/viewmodels lib/app/features/feature_name/ui/views/pages lib/app/features/feature_name/ui/views/widgets && echo -e '[32m✅ Estrutura de pastas criada com sucesso![0m' && echo -e '[33m🔔 Obs.: Certifique-se de renomear a pasta 'feature_name' com o nome da sua feature. [0m' || echo -e '[31m❌ Ocorreu um erro ao criar a estrutura de pastas.[0m'
